text:
[Verse]
Bright sun in the morning
Shining down on me
Feeling so alive now
Happy as can be

[Verse 2]
Moonlight in the night sky
Stars that softly gleam
Dancing in the shadows
Living out a dream

[Chorus]
Sunshine and moonlight
Day fades into night
Joy in every moment
Love and light unite

[Verse 3]
Walking through the daylight
Breathing in the air
Nature all around me
Beauty everywhere

[Chorus]
Sunshine and moonlight
Day fades into night
Joy in every moment
Love and light unite

[Bridge]
Hand in hand we wander
Through the sun and stars
Every step together
No matter where we are
title: Sunshine and Moonlight
